page.title: 07PEOPLE OF STRYT_YR_HWCH
page.content: WE WALKED FROM SONTLEY_FORD,WHICH LAST'S FOR ABOUT ONE MILE. THE FORD COMES OUT BY KILN_FARM BUNGALOW WHICH WAS MOST PROBABLY BUILT IN THE LAST TEN YEARS WE COULD NOT CONFIRM THAT BECAUSE NOONE WAS IN. WE WALKED A BIT FURTHER UNTIL WE REACHED THE NEW COTTAGES. WE TALKED TO THE OWNER OF NUMBER ONE. HE SAID THAT STRYT_YR_HWCH WAS NOT A VILLAGE IT JUST SCATTERED IN THE COUNTRY SIDE. AFTER A BIT MORE WALKING WE CAME TO CLAY_PITS_BUNGALOW WHICH WAS MADE OF HAND MADE BRICKS. AGAIN THERE WAS NOONE IN. WE THEN CAME ACROSS CLAY_PITS_FARM WHERE WE TALKED TO THE FARMER WHO SAID THE HOUSE WAS BUILT IN 1905. WE PASSED A FEW MORE HOUSES THE YEW TREES, OAK COTTAGE AND GROVES COTTAGE.
